name: 1-Bit Platformer Demo
description:
My first game developed in Godot. Currently only has 2 stages but more to come. Run, Jump, squash enemies and collect coins as your progress to the end of each stage.

Controls:
Left/Right - Move
Space - Jump
Enter - Pause

Assets used:
1-Bit Platformer Pack by Kenney
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack
